column5: RAD Its clear now the plan was to reduce the float as much as possible and hold it down to absurd levels for institutions to gobble up shares Freds sold their file scripts for 11M per unitits at least 16M per unit for Rite Aid and probably more most are in big cities which the seeking Alpha article pointed out is not on the balance sheet Thats 4B in liquid value Plus Rite Aid is actually cash flowingThe extension of the TSA agreement increases guidance to 540M to 600Mbetter than last year They did not press release thisjust a filingwhyI think this has been a set up as institutions continue to accumulate fast and they drop the bomb before the shareholder meetingmaybe Bodaken is smarter than we all thought
